html:
I scroll the feed too often
It’s very addictive
The galactic whirl around us
Sometimes I cannot sleep
I won ten goldens way back
In the big lotto
Rats feed close to the building
Scary to get nearby
Large sip of coffee
Deep cigarette inhalation
Day with my computer
A crucifix on a wall
House full of zombie, it’s not a game
Like Sega used to do
On fields vegetation
At homes procreation
title: Vegetation
